resources.string:
Hi welcome to the Android Workshop. 
 
 	 	 The workshop will utilize this holiday to equipe you with the 	 skills and knowledge to develop your first Android apps and be able to be familiar and easily pursue further advancement in your skills after. 
 
 	 	 1. Days: 1st October to 8th October 
 
 	 	 2. Time 9:00am to 11:30am 
 
 	 	 3. Recommended prerequisite Java,but shouldn't stop you from joining. 
 
 	 	 4. Installation Links 
 
 	 Please install the following things before The Workshop. 
 
 	 	 3.1 JRE > 3.2.JRE > https://java.com/en/download/ 
 
 	 	 3.2 JDK > 
 https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase-jdk13-downloads.html 
 
 	 	 3.3 Android Studio > 
 https://developer.android.google.cn/studio/ 
 
 	 	 3.4 IntelliJ IDE (community) > https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/ 
 
 	 	 3.5 Voov/Tencent Meeting > https://voovmeeting.com/download-center.html
